item.title: Venissa's Catering & Authentic Foods Services
item.description:
About Us

Venissa’s Catering offers a delightful array of authentic dishes, featuring local home-ground curry, pepper sauce, Anchar, kuchela, and East Indian sweets. With a focus on traditional flavors and quality ingredients, we bring the taste of home to your events.

Our Services

  • Authentic Dishes: Traditional local cuisine prepared with authentic recipes
  • Home Ground Curry: Fresh, locally ground curry for authentic flavor
  • Traditional Condiments: Homemade pepper sauce, Anchar, and kuchela
  • East Indian Sweets: Traditional East Indian desserts and sweets

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Vanessa Ramjattan
  • Phone: 353-5431
  • Email: venissa.cateringservices@gmail.com
